    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • requestStop

        public void requestStop()
        Safely stop the runnable.

        The run() method must make use of the running parameter for this method to be useful. If it doesn't, the runnable might not be meaningful enough to stop, anyway.

      • finish

        void finish()
        Called when the run() method has finished execution.
